OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD HALLAM UNIVERSITY STUDENTS UNION - INTERNATIONAL STUDENTS SOCIETY

Desc.entry: Arranges cultural events and trips for international students etc. Provides help, advice and support for international students. Informs the multicultural and international student offices of issues concerning international students. Currently looking for students to help run and organise the group.

category.entry: BLACK AND MINORITY ETHNIC PEOPLE - GENERAL SUPPORT ORGANISATIONS
